author: CMSTrackingPOG
body:
#### PR description:

Trivial PR, title says it all.
Part of the migration in #36404.
Went systematically through all of the `CMSDEPRECATED_X` warnings in the `RecoVertex` subsystem from `CMSSW_12_3_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2022-01-21-2300` and removed deprecated API calls.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: get rid of deprecation warnings from `RecoVertex` subsystem
